title: Ep 96: Birding with Grace Bonney
itunes:title: Ep 96: Birding with Grace Bonney
itunes:subtitle: You may know Grace Bonney from Design Sponge but did you know her from her backyard, where she’s been spending the pandemic getting into birding? You do now! Grace tells us all about her adventures in birding and the camera that sparked a love affair....
description:
You may know Grace Bonney from Design Sponge but did you know her from her backyard, where she’s been spending the pandemic getting into birding? You do now! Grace tells us all about her adventures in birding and the camera that sparked a love affair.


Mentioned on the show:

  • CamPark Trail Camera: https://fave.co/3vBD4vm
